wikipedia_page.main:
Manon Awst (born 1983) is a Welsh artist who makes sculptures, installations and performances exploring themes of place, identity and landscape. 
Awst grew up in Anglesey, and moved to Berlin in 2004. She collaborated with German artist Benjamin Walther for a decade. Besides her art career, Awst also writes poetry.
